<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>For the Scheduled Job "Nuvolo Schedule Recurring Maintenances", the OOB time to run is sometime around 11pm. In order for the job to work, it has to run early in the morning, because the script checks for work orders to be generated "Today".</description><healthcheck_type/><name>SM WO Generation - Facilities</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version>21.1.2</product_version><remediation>Change the scheduled job named "Nuvolo Schedule Recurring Maintenances", and set the runtime to early in the AM. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
gr.addQuery('name','Nuvolo Schedule Recurring Maintenances');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

if (gr.next()){ //check the time, and see if it's in the range we want
//1970-01-02 07:00:00
	var sJTime = gr.getDisplayValue('run_time');
	var hours = sJTime.split(':')[0]; //we have a number in string form
	var hoursInt = parseInt(hours); //int versions of hours

if (hoursInt < 6) {
	//do nothing
} else {
	util.handleOutput('In the scheduled Job "Nuvolo Schedule Recurring Maintenances", the time it is set to run locally is not in the am of the required day. Please change the run_time to be between 1 and 3 am.' , 'Warning','Facilities Maintenance');
}

} else {
	util.handleOutput('The scheduled job named "Nuvolo Schedule Recurring Maintenances", is either missing or inactive. Please activate it or request it from Nuvolo Support if scheduled maintenance fucntionality is to be used.' , 'Warning','Facilities Maintenance');
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Michael.Piazza@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-08 15:56:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>280d05f31b2a611070b43227dc4bcb1f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SM WO Generation - Facilities</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_280d05f31b2a611070b43227dc4bcb1f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>iliyan.nedelchev@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-04 09:40:00</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
